department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Requirement for the supply, delivery and installation of a rotary screw type air compressor with attached desiccant dryer system and secondary dry storage tank
description: The Department of National Defence, Royal Military College, has a requirement for the supply, delivery and installation of a rotary screw type air compressor with attached desiccant dryer system and secondary dry storage tank that meets or exceeds the specifications outlined in Annex - Requirement. Delivery is required on or before January 31, 2023.
